Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: the beginning of Miyazawa’s life and his creative years. The first half deals with his childhood and young adulthood through his family’s tribulations as well as his relationship with his sister Toshiko.
